Luckily I can stay holed up in my office for the next few weeks. Keeping some t-shirts in the car just in case. Got some aquafor and a recommendation for calendula cream. Plus Benadryl!

Posts.Content: Feb 15, 2017 09:06PM ArtyMom wrote: The skin in my armpit split open with about 10 treatments left, my skin was really red and raw. My doctor said to keep putting aquaphor on it and also the Miaderm patches which really help with the friction of everyday movement. There were a couple of days where I didn't sleep well because anytime I would move the pain would wake me up. I then stayed home to rest. As fast as my armpit got red, it healed and. It is now very tan. My boost site is now very red and angry but I keep slathering on the moisturizer every chance I get. Don't worry, it will all get better
Posts.Title: Starting Rads in January 2017 ElizabethAM Caligirl55
